books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A young widow buys a bed-and-breakfast.
books.name: THE INN AT ROSE HARBOR

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A woman’s successful life is disrupted by the appearance of an 18-year-old girl with a link to her past.
books.name: WHERE WE BELONG

books.author: by Philippa Gregory
books.description: Chicanery in the court of Edward IV, narrated by Anne Neville.
books.name: THE KINGMAKER’S DAUGHTER

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: If the counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath can discover who has targeted him for death, he can prevent a terrorist attack.
books.name: BLACK LIST

books.author: by Jonathan Tropper
books.description: Longstanding grudges resurface when a family honors its patriarch’s last request, that his survivors spend the week together.
books.name: THIS IS WHERE I LEAVE YOU

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, a man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their North Carolina town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Jamie McGuire
books.description: A college girl in search of a new beginning makes a bet with an attractive but dangerous man.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL DISASTER

books.author: by Gina L. Maxwell
books.description: An injured martial arts fighter struggles to win the heart of his conditioning trainer, before she gives it to somebody else.
books.name: SEDUCING CINDERELLA

books.author: by Jennifer Probst
books.description: A billionaire who needs a wife offers a one-year marriage in name only to a bookstore owner.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE BARGAIN
